title: President

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Reveal - The next day, you have a secret 3 vote. 1 use.
Shoot - Deal a basic attack to someone. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: If you die, the next night, all Unseen can use their ability twice.

desc:
Post 1145
*I am Giorgia. I am a woman. I am a mother. I am christian.*
